groups.name: general
groups.description: General properties to be used for the applications.

properties.name: general.context-url
properties.description: ContextUrl for the service to use.

properties.name: general.base-path
properties.description: Base path for the controllers to be deployed at. If nothing is set, the project-individual defaults will be used

properties.name: general.tenant
properties.description: Tenant to be used by the tmforum api.

properties.name: general.ngsild-or-query-value
properties.description:
Character used in target NGSI-LD broker for making
 or queries in a specific value

properties.name: general.ngsild-or-query-key
properties.description:
Character used in target NGSI-LD broker for making
 or queries between mutiple parameters

properties.name: general.enclose-query
properties.description: Whether to enclose queries using bracets or not
